Description: Does nothing. When invoked:|Receive [fire]1 burn for each Flame Essence.

Name: essence_ice
Description: Does nothing. When invoked:|Receive [ice]1 freeze for each Frost Essence.

Name: essence_shock

Name: essence_weaken

Name: essence_poison

Name: essence_dark

Name: mf_stun
Description: Random equipment is disabled for the turn.

Description: Lose a dice next turn.

Name: nothing
Description: Does absolutely nothing.

Name: alternate_nothing
Description: Doesn't do something.

Name: grace
Description: At the start of your turn[;] if your health is less than|your Grace ([heart]<value>[])[;] swap your health and your Grace.

Name: healaftercombat
Description: After combat[;] recover [heal]<value> health.|Doesn't trigger if you flee.

Name: poisonovertime
Description: At the end of your turn[;] receive [poison]1 poison.|Lasts for <value> turns.

Name: revolver
